text:
Market notes for 6/21:
- #Bitcoin & #Ethereum rallying strongly off trendline support following several shakeouts
- While still in a power uptrend, momentum in tech $QQQ $XLK is weakening a bit (increased selling)
- $IWM consolidating from its early June upside breakout
author: Pat McGrady

text: The bullish market/economic slant shown in the $XLK vs. $IEF ratio on May 7 still applies. The ratio is now above a 17-month base.
author: Chris Ciovacco

text:
HubSpot $HUBS working on a little bull flag here.

This was one of the strongest software names during the recent rally. So, it would make sense that it wouldn't give much back. 

Leaders gonna lead.
